summary: An Ordinance relating to and providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property for public street, highway, sewer and drainage purposes, over and across Government lot three (3), section thirty-five (350, township twenty-four (24) north, range four (40 east, Willamette Meridian, and shore lands adjoining, extending from Rainier Avenue (formerly fifty-first Avenue South) to the line of navigability in Lake Washington, as provided for in Ordinance No. 39,385, approved April 22, 1919, and making an appropriation therefor, creating a deficit and declaring the emergency.therefor.
